import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import useSWR from "swr"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import Link from "next/link"; import { gql, hasuraUserClient } from "../../../lib/hasura-user-client"; const getProjectsIds = gql` { Project { id Title Description } } `; const GetProjectByID = gql` query GetProjectByID($id: Int!) { Project_by_pk(id: $id) { id Title Description } } `; const GetProjectByUser = gql` query User($id: Int!) { User(where: { project_id: { _is_null: true } }) { id Name } } `; export const getStaticPaths = async () => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { Project } = await hasura.request(getProjectsIds); return { paths: Project.map(({ id }) => ({ params: { id: id.toString(), }, })), fallback: false, }; }; export const getStaticProps = async ({ params }) => { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { id } = params; const initialData = await hasura.request(GetProjectByID, { id }); return { props: { initialData, }, revalidate: 1, }; }; const UpdateProject = gql` mutation update_Candidate_by_pk( $id: Int! $Title: String! $Description: String! ) { update_Project_by_pk( pk_columns: { id: $id } _set: { Title: $Title, Description: $Description } ) { Title Description } } `; export default function CandidateEdit({ initialData }) { const hasura = hasuraUserClient(); const { query } = useRouter(); const router = useRouter(); const { id } = query; const { handleSubmit, register, control, errors, formState: { isSubmitting }, defaultValues: { ...defaultValues }, } = useForm(); const { data, mutate } = useSWR( [GetProjectByID, id], (query, id) => hasura.request(query, { id }), { initialData, revalidateOnMount: true, } ); const onSubmit = async ({ Title, Description }) => { try { const id = data.Project_by_pk.id; console.log(id); const { update_Project_by_pk } = await hasura.request(UpdateProject, { id, Title, Description, }); mutate({ ...data, ...update_Project_by_pk, }); router.push(`/Project/List`); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return (
